short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GFG on Striver is now 'TUF Enhancer'!
Customize sheets on takeUforward (add question links, visual changes).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works on NEW UI of takeUforward!!
This extension brings some customizations to the sheets on takeUforward.
 • Adds extra question links to the sheets wherever possible,
 • Some visual changes to the site, (and more to be cooked!)

**What's New in TUF Enhancer?**
There's now an option to change how the sheet looks. The sections/topics which are 100% complete will now be visually different from the ones which are incomplete, to make it more distinguishable.!
[NOTE] You need to turn this feature ON from the gear icon in the extension popup.
